Credits

Funding

GWE's RSE would not have been possible without funding from:

  • National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NA-MIC)
  • UCSD's Center for Research in Biological Systems (CRBS)

Open Source Community

GWE's RSE would not have been possible without the following open source development resources:

  • Terracotta - DBMS (Persisted and Distributed Memory)
  • Velocity - Template Engine
  • Jetty - Web Server
  • Log4j - Logging Utility
  • OpenCSV - CSV Parser Library
  • Multiple Apache/Jakarta Commons Projects
  • JSON Simple - JSON Encoder/Decoder Toolkit
  • JQuery - Javascript/AJAX Library
  • WebFX - DHTML Widgets
  • FamFamFam - Icons

GWE's RSE would not have been possible without the following open source development tools:

  • Eclipse - IDE
  • Maven - Software Project Management Tool
  • Subversion - Source Code Management System (SCM)
  • Hudson - Continuous Integration Engine
  • JUnit - Testing Framework
  • Apache - Web Server
  • Tomcat - Web Application Container

GWE's RSE would not have been possible without the following, free licensed (for open source projects such as GWE), development tools:

  • JIRA - Issue Traker
